participant_abstract.sent: I felt that the meeting was interesting and useful.
I learned a lot from the ID who seemed to know her presentation well.
The marketing Expert also brought useful information and helped to form ideas and decisions.
The project manager kept the meeting going and fuelled discussion.
She tried to make sure that all decisions were made.

participant_actions.sent: ID - working on look and feel.
PM - leading and structuring presentations and discussion.

participant_decisions.sent: Chip on Print - regular - for lighting.
Supplements - numbers, channel changer, volume, power.

participant_problems.sent: The decision on supplements was left to the end which I think is because the UID was not sufficiently prepared.
No real decision was reached on the fruit and vegetable idea, just that we were going to use it because it is trendy.
